name: Escape From Thetanic
description:
As Thetanic's newest test subject... Huh, you want to know what happened to the last subject? That doesn't matter any more, the past is the past and you are the property of Thetanic Inc. now...

After awaking to discover that you have been abducted, you are given the task of testing Thetanic's latest experimental technology, whether you want to or not. You must choose to either carefully navigate your way through their testing facility using the TX-300 Telecannon or face disintegration in a rising pool of plasma.

Features
  • First-Person play
  • The TX-300 Telecannon projectile launcher
  • Multiple moving and static platforms to traverse
  • No enemies, just fun platforming using teleportation
  • A nice background soundtrack
  • Supports keyboard/mouse
Controls
  • Fire/Charge - Click/Hold left mouse button
  • Look - Mouselook
  • Movement - Directional keys/ WSAD
  • Jump - Space
  • Run - Shift
